sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with kou gan 口疳 , oral gan -illness. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 87: 唇口癢痛，牙 齒峭黑，舌上生瘡，腦中乾熱，齦肉赤爛，頰腫齒疼，熱毒熏蒸，口多 臭氣，故曰口齒疳也 , “The lips and mouth itch and ache. The teeth become pointed and turn black. Sores develop on the tongue. There is heat in the chest. The flesh of the gums turns red and rots. The cheeks are swollen, and the teeth ache. Heat poison steams. Much qi with a bad odor comes from the mouth. Hence this is called ‘ oral and dental gan -illness ’”.
